 2018-04952018-05-03
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
PrecisAppointment of DAVID PARADISO of Victoria, British Columbia, to be interim Chairperson of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police External Review Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year, effective June 18, 2018.
